sheet.description: CLEAN & CLEAR® is Canada's #1 teen skincare brand offering trusted results when fighting acne, preventing breakouts. Let CLEAN & CLEAR® help your skin!
CLEAN & CLEAR ESSENTIALS® Dual Action Moisturizer is oil-free and combines acne-fighting ingredients, to hydrate dry skin. Learn more at CLEANANDCLEAR.ca
What's the difference between a pimple, acne, or bacne? Find out available treatments from CLEAN & CLEAR® and which products to use to prevent breakouts.
At CLEAN & CLEAR®, we believe that everyone is beautiful in their own skin. Watch these courageous individuals as they share their story with the world.
What are blackheads and how are they caused? Learn the basics of treating and preventing blackheads with CLEAN & CLEAR® products. Visit CLEANANDCLEAR.ca
CLEAN & CLEAR® Morning Burst® Facial Cleanser has a unique gel formula containing Vitamin C and Ginseng. Learn more about this product at CLEANANDCLEAR.ca
CLEAN & CLEAR® operates globally with various vendors. If you're looking for a CLEAN & CLEAR® site for other countries or regions, you can find them here!
The CLEAN & CLEAR ESSENTIALS® Skin Care Pack contains: Foaming Facial Cleanser, Deep Cleaning Astringent & Dual Action Moisturizer for healthy looking skin!
YouTuber Mia (MamaMiaMakeup) shares her skincare tips to get rid of acne and which CLEAN & CLEAR® skincare products to try. Watch more at CLEANANDCLEAR.ca
Looking to start a skincare routine or to improve your skin's health? Visit CLEANANDCLEAR.ca to understand why we recommend washing your face twice a day.
Find out how you can manage oily skin by using the right skincare routine and with products from CLEAN & CLEAR®. Visit CLEANANDCLEAR.ca to learn more!
CLEAN & CLEAR® MORNING BURST® Hydrating Facial Cleanser with BURSTING BEADS is formulated with water, not oil. Get a deep clean while refreshing your skin.
CLEAN & CLEAR® offers a range of skin care and acne treatment products for all skin types, formulated to fit your unique skin needs. Visit CLEANANDCLEAR.ca
Looking to buy a CLEAN & CLEAR® product? Visit CLEANANDCLEAR.ca to check availability in your desired online vendor, or to find a store located near you!

CLEAN & CLEAR® offers a range of skin care and acne treatment products for all skin types, formulated to fit your unique skin needs. Visit CLEANANDCLEAR.ca
Keep your skin clear and healthy looking by following these 5 simple skincare habits from the skin experts at CLEAN & CLEAR®. Read on at CLEANANDCLEAR.ca!
Want to stay in the know about our last products and skincare tips? Never miss out on the products that are trending when you visit us at CLEANANDCLEAR.ca
Looking to manage oily skin or how to deal with pimples and acne? Visit CLEANANDCLEAR.ca and get to know all the facts and myths about a skincare routine.
Do certain foods cause acne? Can you cure acne by washing your face? Get the answers to some commonly asked questions from the experts at CLEAN & CLEAR®.
Clean & Clear® Lemon Zesty Scrub with vitamin C gently cleanses, exfoliates and smoothes skin. Made with an oil-free formula. Learn more at CLEANANDCLEAR.ca
Find out what's so great about CLEAN & CLEAR® products! Get honest reviews and great tips on how to deal with your acne. Learn more at CLEANANDCLEAR.ca
Nobody likes pimples or the acne scars it leaves behind! At CLEANANDCLEAR.ca, find the best way to deal with acne marks and learn how you can prevent them.
This skincare routine will help fight blackheads by keeping your skin properly cleansed, toned & moisturized. Visit CLEANANDCLEAR.ca to learn and read more!
If your skin looks really shiny throughout the day, visit CLEANANDCLEAR.ca to learn about skincare routines that can help keep your oily skin under control.
CLEAN & CLEAR® BLACKHEAD ERASER® Scrub has exfoliating beads that work to gently clean skin and avoid breakouts. Visit CLEANANDCLEAR.ca to learn more!
Watch YouTuber Orly's (Lovenector13) tips and tricks to getting rid of blackheads and preventing future breakouts. Visit CLEANANDCLEAR.ca to learn more.
CLEAN & CLEAR® lemon cleansing wipes remove dirt, makeup & impurities with little residue. Oil free & gentle enough for everyday use. Visit CLEANANDCLEAR.ca
Do you have combination, dry or oily skin? At CLEANANDCLEAR.ca, learn about your skin type & pick the right products & treatments. Visit CLEANANDCLEAR.ca!

Visit CLEANANDCLEAR.ca to find out more about Nadine's journey, a gay child who learned to accept herself & become a strong queer activist in her community.

CLEAN & CLEAR® Watermelon Daily Moisturizing Wipes gently remove makeup, dirt & oil while hydrating skin. Try these wipes to leave your skin feeling fresh!

CLEAN & CLEAR® Soothing Eye Makeup Remover's oil-free dual-phase formula gently and effectively dissolves all traces of eye makeup, even waterproof mascara.

CLEAN & CLEAR Night Relaxing® jelly sheet mask soothes & replenishes skin, targeting the eye area. Helps to restore and lock in nourishing ingredients.

CLEAN & CLEAR® hydrating Watermelon Gel Face Moisturizer instantly quenches & calms dry skin. Learn how your face can feel refreshed at CleanandClear.ca.
CLEAN & CLEAR® Watermelon Gel Face Cleanser removes dirt & impurities while providing hydration. Learn how our cleanser is designed to gently cleanse.
With deep sea minerals & sea kelp extract, CLEAN & CLEAR® ultra-soft All-In-One Cleansing Wipe removes daily build up. Learn more at CLEANANDCLEAR.ca!
CLEAN & CLEAR CONTINUOUS CONTROL® Acne Cleanser delivers the acne-fighting ingredient, Benzoyl Peroxide, directly into pores where pimples start. Read more!
With the help of our YouTuber friend Mia (AKA MamaMiaMakeup), we'll be sharing e a few tips on treating your acne marks! Visit CLEANANDCLEAR.ca to watch!
CLEAN & CLEAR ESSENTIALS® Foaming Facial Cleanser for Sensitive Skin has an oil-free formula that gently removes dirt & make-up. Visit CLEANANDCLEAR.ca
CLEAN & CLEAR PERSA-GEL® 5 is a unique acne medication formula that goes to work releasing the medicine deep into the pores where breakouts & pimples start.
CLEAN & CLEAR® Deep Action Cream Cleanser is an oil-free formula that removes dirt, oil and make-up deep down to your pores. Learn more at CLEANANDCLEAR.ca!
These CLEAN & CLEAR® Makeup Dissolving Facial Cleansing Wipes instantly lift away all traces of oil, dirt, and even waterproof mascara, without drying skin!
